name: socialclient
description: Social Media Client course assignement from Noroff.

scripts.build: sass src/scss:dist/css && copy index.html dist\index.html && xcopy feed dist\feed /E /I && xcopy login dist\login /E /I && xcopy post dist\post /E /I && xcopy profile dist\profile /E /I && mkdir dist\css && copy node_modules\bootstrap\dist\css\bootstrap.min.css dist\css\bootstrap.min.css && mkdir dist\js && copy src\js\* dist\js\

author: Oddvar Zakarias Kristiansen
